collections.noBookmarkSupport: Your platform does not support bookmarks.

hubAddFeedSheet.title: Sorry üòî
desc: This feature will be expanded in the future!
A default set of destinations has been populated for you.
Bluesky users can access their feeds from their profile (5th tab), for now.

infoHome.label: Home Timeline
description: You can see posts from yourself and everyone you follow here.

infoLocal.label: Local Timeline
description: This is your server's local timeline.
It displays posts from you and other users in your server.

infoHashtag.label: Hashtag Timeline
description: It displays a list of all posts containing this hashtag.

infoUser.label: User Timeline
description: You can view posts, shares and replies from the selected user here.

infoPublic.label: Public Timeline
description: This timeline displays every posts visible to your server.
This includes posts from your server, as well as other servers your server can talk with.

infoBubble.label: Bubble Timeline
description: This timeline displays all posts made by users in a list of servers curated by your server admin.
You can find this list of servers as "Known Network", from your server's documentation.

infoSocial.label: Social Timeline
description: This timeline is a combination of your home and local timelines.
So, it shows posts from you, your friends and local posts from users in your server.

infoList.label: List Timeline
description: This timeline displays posts saved inside your selected list.
You can edit what gets saved to this list from your server's web interface!

infoFeed.label: Feed Timeline
description: This is a custom feed timeline.
Custom feeds are services that provide custom algorithms to users through the AT Protocol.
This allows users to choose their own timelines.
